meta.title: Contact Abdul Rohim - Full-Stack Developer
meta.description: Contact Abdul Rohim - Full-Stack Developer. Get in touch for web development, mobile applications, and custom software solutions. Free consultation available.
meta.keywords: Abdul Rohim, Contact, Full-Stack Developer, Web Development, Mobile Development, React, Next.js, React Native, Software Solutions

hero.heading: Let's Work Together
hero.description: Ready to bring your ideas to life? Let's discuss your project and create something exceptional.

contactInformation.heading: Get In Touch
contactInformation.subheading: Choose your preferred way to reach out. I'm always excited to discuss new projects and opportunities.

contactForm.heading: Send Me a Message
contactForm.description: Fill out the form below and I'll get back to you within 24 hours. Let's discuss your project requirements and goals.

fields.label: Project Description
fields.placeholder: Please describe your project requirements, goals, features you need, and any specific technologies or constraints you have in mind. The more details you provide, the better I can understand your needs.

fields.label: How did you hear about me?

expectations.title: Quick Response
expectations.description: I usually respond within 24 hours, often much faster during business hours (Mon–Sat, 9:00 – 17:00 WIB).

expectations.title: Free Consultation
expectations.description: Initial project discussion and technical consultation are completely free with no obligations.

expectations.title: Detailed Proposal
expectations.description: Receive a comprehensive project proposal with timeline, pricing, and technical approach.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Quick answers to common questions about working together.

questions.question: How quickly can you start my project?
questions.answer: I typically respond to inquiries within 24 hours. Once we agree on project scope and timeline, I can usually start within 1-2 weeks, depending on my current workload and project complexity.

questions.question: Do you offer free consultations?
questions.answer: Yes! I offer a free initial consultation to understand your project requirements, discuss technical approaches, and provide you with a detailed proposal and timeline.

questions.question: What's your development process?
questions.answer: I follow a 4-step process: Discovery (understanding requirements), Planning (technical architecture), Development (agile development with regular updates), and Deployment (production launch with monitoring).

questions.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
questions.answer: Absolutely! I provide ongoing support and maintenance services to ensure your application stays secure, updated, and performs optimally. Support packages can be customized based on your needs.

questions.question: Can you work with my existing team?
questions.answer: Yes, I'm experienced in collaborating with existing development teams, designers, and project managers. I can integrate seamlessly into your workflow and communication tools.

finalCta.heading: Ready to Get Started?
finalCta.description: Don't let your great ideas stay as just ideas. Let's turn them into reality with modern, scalable solutions that drive your business forward.
